verses.text: Ex quelemtac ab'ec, yujto tzex avtaji yic tzeyik' e jelanil, yic sq'uib' pax e pensar.
Yalnhej b'aj ayex eq'ui, t'a junok tzalan, ma t'a yol b'e, ma b'aj schalaj sb'a b'e, tzex avtaji.
Anhejtona' t'a spuertail e chonhab', tzex avtajpaxi.
E masanil ex anima ayex t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, ab'ec.
Ex quelemtac to mantalaj e pensar, k'ayb'ejec e b'ha t'a jelanil. Ex chuk e pensar, sayec jelan pensaril.
Ab'ec val sik'lab'il, ol alchaj juntzanh tastac nivac yelk'och t'ayex, manhxo jantacoc swach'il.
Te yel tas ol alchaj t'ayex, malaj tas tonhej ol nachajq'ueoc.
Masanil juntzanh lolonel tik wach'nhej, malaj jab'oc es t'ay.
Ha eb' jelan, secojtac tz'aj snachajel juntzanh lolonel tik yuj eb'. Ha eb' ay spensar yojtac eb' tas syalelk'ochi.
Hak'ek eyip eyik'an e jelanil yet' aj pensaril, yujto yelxo val te niwan yelk'och t'a yichanh q'uen oro yet' q'uen plata.
Yelxo val te wach' jelanil t'a yichanh q'uen q'ueen te wach' yilji yet' t'a yichanh junok tas snib'aj val ochi.
Ha jelanil, yetb'eyum sb'a yet' wach' pensaril. Syak' cojtaquejel juntzanh wach' razonal.
Tato ay yelk'och Jehová t'ayonh, sco chaccanel chukal. Tato jelan onh, max yal-laj quik'anchaanh co b'a. Max co nib'ejochlaj chuk b'eyb'al yet' es.
Tato ay co jelanil, syal co naan junok tas sco k'ulej t'a stojolal, tz'elnhejpaxk'ochi.
Ha yuj jelanil syak' yajalil eb' rey, tojol syutej eb' sch'olb'itan tastac yaj eb' yetanimail.
Yuj jelanil chi', a eb' ayoch yajalil, wach' syutej eb' stanhvan schonhab', wach' pax syutej eb' sb'oan yaj yoval eb' anima.
Ha mach sayanek' jelanil yet' smasanil sk'ool, tz'ilchaj yuj.
Yuj jelanil chi', tz'aj co b'eyumal, tzonh b'inaj yuj, ay pax quelk'ochi.
Ha tas tz'ilchaj yuj jelanil chi', yelxo te wach' t'a yichanh q'uen oro yet' q'uen plata sik'b'ileli.
Yuj jelanil, sco b'eyb'alej wach'ilal yet' tojolal.
Ha mach snib'an jelanil, ol yik' sb'eyumal yuj. Ol b'ud'joc spat yuj masanil tastac wach'.
Ha jelanil chi', aytaxoneq'ui ayic ix el yich smunlajel Jehová, ayic manto sb'o masanil tastac,
ayic manto sb'o yol yib'anhk’inal tik,
ayic mantalaj ha' nivac mar, mantalaj pax sjaj ha' nivac ha' sq'ueuli yet' pax sjaj ha' cotac ha'.
Ayic manto sb'olaj lum tzalquixtac yet' lum nivac vitz, ayxoek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ix yik'canel yich jelanil Jehová ayic manto sb'olaj lum lum tik, mantalaj spococal jun yol yib'anhk’inal tik ta'.
Ayic ix sb'oanq'ue satcha’anh masanto b'aj schalaj sb'a yet' ha' mar, aytaxon ek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ayic ix sb'oan asun ay t'a satcha’anh yet' pax yic ix syamanoch vaan ha' mar,
ayic ix yalan t'ha ha' mar chi' to manh ol el ha' b'aj aycani yet' pax ix yak'anem yich lum lum tik, aytaxon ek' jelanil chi' ta'.
Ha yuj sjelanil Dios ix sb'oq'ue masanil tastac, ste tzalaj yuj tastac ix sb'o chi', yujto ha' sch'oxanel sjelanil.
Stzalaj yuj yol yib'anhk’inal yet' eb' anima sb'onac.
Axo ticnaic ex anima, ab'ec val tas tz'alchaj t'ayex, b'eyb'alejec jelanil yic te wach' eyico'.
Chaec eyab' e k'ayb'ub'al, manh e patiquejel jelanil.
Te wach' yic mach scham val yab'an lolonel yic jelanil,
yujto a mach tz'ilchaj jelanil chi' yuj, tz'ilchajpax sq'uinal, syik'anpax swach'k'olal Jehová.
Palta a mach max chaan yab' lolonel yic jelanil, munil syik'cot yaelal t'a yib'anh.
